yaml.title: Getting started with LaTeX
yaml.description: LaTeX makes it easier to produce papers that look great, but it can be overwhelming at the start. These notes help you get up-and-running with LaTeX.

language.appendix-attribution-cite-as: For attribution, please cite this work as:
